txt_en: Whatever you believe with feeling becomes your reality.
txt_cn: 无论什么，只要发自心底地坚信，都能成真。
author: Brian Tracy

txt_en: Happiness adds and multiplies, as we divide it with others.
txt_cn: 与他人分享快乐，我们会收获加倍的快乐。
author: A. Nielsen

txt_en: In every walk with nature, one receives far more than he seeks.
txt_cn: 每一次与自然同行，都会有意外的收获。
author: John Muir

txt_en: It is not beauty that endears, it's love that makes us see beauty.
txt_cn: 并非美丽招人爱，而是爱让我们看到了美丽。
author: Leo Tolstoy

txt_en: All change is not growth, as all movement is not forward.
txt_cn: 不是所有的改变都是成长，正如不是所有的运动都是前进。
author: Ellen Glasgow

txt_en: Challenges are what make life interesting and overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.
txt_cn: 挑战让生活趣味盎然，战胜挑战让生活意义非凡。
author: Joshua J. Marine

txt_en: Believe you can and you're half way there.
txt_cn: 相信你能行，你就成功了一半。
author: Theodore Roosevelt

txt_en: Continuous improvement is better than delayed perfection.
txt_cn: 持续的改进，胜过延迟的完美。
author: Mark Twain

txt_en: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
txt_cn: 你不必生而伟大，但要开始变得伟大。
author: Zig Ziglar

txt_en: Knowledge is of no value unless you put it into practice.
txt_cn: 只有付诸实践，知识才有价值。
author: Anton Chekhov

txt_en: How you think about a problem is more important than the problem itself, so always think positively.
txt_cn: 如何看待问题远比问题本身来得重要，所以永远要正向思考。
author: Norman Vincent Peale

txt_en: Action is the foundational key to all success.
txt_cn: 行动是所有成功的根本。
author: Pablo Picasso
